subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=178|rad=韋|as=13|sn=22|canj=DQNCR|four=|ids=⿰韋詹}}

# a shield, a screen
# (same as [[襜]]) the low front of a robe
# gown
# etc.
# a short coat that have no lining
# a small mud guard
# or fender
# a leather garment worn during sacrificial rituals in ancient times
